snippet: Six people and six Belize firms were accused in a federal indictment of a complex scheme to launder money.
abstract: Six people and six Belize firms are accused in a federal indictment in Federal District Court in Brooklyn of a complex scheme to launder money; $500 million scheme ran from January 2009 through September 2014.
lead_paragraph: Six people and six Belize firms were accused in a federal indictment of a complex scheme to launder money.

headline.main: $500 Million Stock Fraud Alleged in Brooklyn Court
headline.print_headline: $500 Million Stock Fraud Alleged in Brooklyn Court
